sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useMediaQuery } from 'react-responsive' const SideNavBar = () => { const isDesktop = useMediaQuery({ query: '(min-device-width: 640px)' }) const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); const openNavBar = () => { setIsOpen(true); } return (
{/*
  • ×

  • Home

  • My Account

  • My Company

  • My Settings

  • News

  • Analytics
{isDesktop &&

  • Home

  • My Account

  • My Company

  • My Settings

  • News

  • Analytics
} */}

  • Home

  • My Account

  • My Company

  • My Settings

  • News

  • Analytics
) } export default SideNavBar
